derivation: from G4862 (συντρίβω) and the base of G5147 (συντρίβω);
kjv_def: break (in pieces), broken to shivers (+ -hearted), bruise
strongs_def: to crush completely, i.e. to shatter (literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. break, to break in pieces, shiver
  2. to tread down
    1. to put Satan under foot and (as a conqueror) trample on him
    2. to break down, crush
      1. to tear one's body and shatter one's strength
